channel.title: Abouts on coxley

item.title: About
item.description: Hey, thanks for reading! My name is Codey Oxley and I’m a programmer. Reviewing diffs is one of my favorite things to do. I think it’s because I like learning intricacies of systems, and passing them on. But most importantly I care about code quality1 — a lot. I believe when we lower the friction to write good code by giving thorough examples in reviews, we see the biggest impact.
